short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows for easy switching between environment URLs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enviroswitcher allows you to easily switch between your development environments to compare differences quickly. Placeholders can be used to force user input before switching. This is perfect if you have development environments based on Jira codes. Enviroswitcher is locked down to the hosts you provide and detects when a matching URL is loaded. Multiple site names are also supported if they have the same environment URL structures.
